website_summaries.verdict: You can debate the price, but the iPhone-friendly Bose OE2is are very comfortable everyday-use headphones with a compact frame and balanced, detailed sound.
pros: The  Bose OE2i Headphones are more compact than the original OE ("on-ear") headphones
They're lightweight, very comfortable, and feature a fold-up design with an included carrying case, a detachable headphone cord, and an inline remote and microphone for iPhone users
They also offer very good sound quality
cons: The fidelity comes up short on bass resonance

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a replacement for the Bose Quiet Comfort 15 which I had for a few years, and after trying on many different brands of noise canceling and high end headphones - I tried these on. They are much more comfortable (to me), than the QC 15s and the sound quality seems better as well. I know they don't technically "noise cancel" but they are quite well padded and with music at a low volume, they do a good job of cutting down on background (annoying coworker) noise, plus - there are no batteries to have to recharge. The microphone seems better than the QC15 one I had purchased, but I haven't done extensive testing with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: zip77

customer_reviews.title: Bose OE2i
customer_reviews.text: Had this ordered from Amazon since I was looking for a replacement to my Ultimate Ears On Ear headphones (which my sister got from me). Was doing some research and chose this instead of the monster inspiration head phones. I'm quite happy with the performance. Given that I was able to break in the set for 30 hours playing straight. Build is okay. The padding is my favorite. Memory foam cushion and easy on the ears.
customer_reviews.author: spam jalandoni

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones. Comfortable and excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are incredible. They have a very good balance... not like the previous version where the bass was too high. These are just perfect. They are very comfortable on the ear and the remote for the iPhone makes them even more comfortable to control your music. The possibility to remove the cable from the headphones is a great improvement from the previous version since it allows you to replace the cable in case it breaks. I've been using these headphones for about 9 months now and I'm very happy with them. I highly recommend this product to anybody looking for amazing sound quality and comfortable headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Cerda Barra

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have found the headphones to work as advertised. They are comfortable, provide excellent sound reproduction, and the microphone for the iPhone works great. Additionally, I found in two trips that they do a sufficient job of blocking out the cabin noise in the jets. Although not "noise cancelling" headphones, the foam seems to dampen enough of the background noise that the music can be enjoyed and that one's mind can be taken off being in a cramped seat in a long metal tube with 120 or so of your now closest friends.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reiniger

customer_reviews.title: The detachable cable...
customer_reviews.text: ...is an under-praised feature. Is it a common feature? I don't know-- this is my first set of nice headphones and I find the detachable cable comes in very handy, multiple times per day. I wanted a wired headset to use with my iPhone near-constantly, and these have been great for me. Sound quality and microphone placement are good for talking on the phone. The controls are in a handy position. Music and podcasts sound great to me. The headset is light and comfortable and not too bulky. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Aloofite

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...did a lot of research and it paid off.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome. I'm a huge fan of clarity...those bass bumping years are behind me. These headphones deliver the absolute right amount of bass. I went to BestBuy and tried multiple headphones and these are what I chose. Beats are wayyy too bassy...good for top 40 and rap but nothing else. If you actually want to enjoy you're music, even rap. Choose Bose. I got them for around $100 and the new Soundtrue, which are the exact headphones with a fresh coat of paint are $180. Get them while you still can.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Used with iphone 4S for calling
customer_reviews.text: The headset works very well in terms of allowing conversations but not completely blocking other sounds one encounters while traveling - and you should be able to hear while driving. Good range from bass on up and clarity. Sometimes those I am talking to complain that my voice seems to "go in and out" and I am unsure why that is as it occurs in areas of excellent cellular signal. I suspect the mic is picking up road noise and perhaps contact with my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Pecos Bill 1

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for air travel
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on these headphones for a long airplane trip (18 hours!) They were very comfortable to wear for a long trip and the sound was excellent. Obviously they aren't noise canceling, but they did a great job of keeping me fairly oblivious to the details of the obnoxious conversations going on around me while flying. Great buy. This was my first Bose product purchase and turned out to not be my last either.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones back in June and at the time I must have tried every headphone on the market. These compact on ear headphones are by far the best sounding and most comfortable headphones. Listening to music or watching movies is such a treat with these powerhouse headphones. You won't regret it, also aside from the Excellant quality sound, these headphones fold up and fit perfectly in their travel case making them a best choice when your on the move. Thanks Bose!
customer_reviews.author: SamuelRiveraPhotography

customer_reviews.title: Bose always a Boss...
customer_reviews.text: They're lightweight, very comfortable, and feature a fold-up design with an included carrying case, a detachable headphone cord, and an inline remote and microphone. Its not bulky and perfect fit for your ears with a descent noise cancellation. My only complaint is about the short on bass resonance when compared to Beats headphones. But overall I like to hear music on the Boss rather than Beats. After all Bose is the Boss .
customer_reviews.author: James J

customer_reviews.title: A headphone that make you dancing
customer_reviews.text: i wanted a headphone for a long time, tried and tested many. Starting from Sony , panasonic, Sennheiser etc. I visited multiple stores to cehck it personally, at last I settled on Bose headphones, and found Bose o2i is the best suits me. It is light ease of use, integrated with IPhone & IPOD. Once I started using it, felt the diffrence in music and started loving it. Spend 3 to 4hours daily. Feeling fresh everyday. Positives: Light weight, foldable over the ear not too pressing very confortable Cons :- the carrying box looks cheap and does not have other adpter types. No belt holder, I expected that on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Shanty Tony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sounding headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have several headphones recently, including these and Skullcandy Aviators and Navigators. These are the best sounding headphones, although not as stylish. They fit a little tight on my big head, but that is actually OK for working out at the gym. Also, the tight fit and on ear style does a fairly good job of blocking the outside noise. I've worn them while mowing the lawn and was very pleased. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Al Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very pleased with the Bose OE2i Audio Headphones. The sound is amazing, the fit is good (wish they were available in a behind-the-head style) and they're super light-weight. I bought them for use at the gym but have since decided I don't want to sweat all over them. Comfortable enough to fall asleep while wearing. Cheers! =^..^=
customer_reviews.author: The Clean Veganista

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a new set of headphones for home (TV and computer) use and saw great reviews for the Bose OE2i. I love them. They fit well (I prefer over than around the ear, anyway) and provide amazing sound reproduction. I enjoy the fact that they collapse into a small, secure carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Spy Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Bose is the best
customer_reviews.text: Now I know what everyone is talking about. When you use the Bose headphones The music is so clear. You feel like you are right there in the same room with the band! I love the adjustment for volume right at your fingertips. You have to try the experience!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Levy

customer_reviews.title: Loose wire
customer_reviews.text: I love the head phones. The reason for 4 stars is because the connection at the tip of the jack when you put it into the speaker you have to play with the cord to hear. Did not return because it would cost me a lot more than the phones themselves. I can live with it. Would otherwise recommend to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Massiah

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have the old noise cancelling head phones from Bose. In my opinion these are just as good. These are smaller and more compact for easier to travel. Great sound and inline mic and volume controls work great with iphone 5 and ipad3.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: The best companion to my iPad and iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are compact, come with a great little soft zipped holder. By setting your iTunes and podcasts equalizer to nil or no equalizer Bose headphones does the perfect job of accommodating the sound structure. Comfortable and with a great bass responses these phones completely met my expectation. The small inline controller on the cord provides good control for pausing, increasing and decreasing the volume of sound tracks and the controller is also an inline microphone to take calls. Highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Andy B

customer_reviews.title: Absolute best - what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted to buy a bose headphone but not willing to pay up to 100 box. I've used a couple of cheap headphones but not satisfied, so i decided its time to upgrade. when i did bought my bose OE2i, i wasn't disappointed at all, I feel its worth every penny. It doesn't hurt in the ear after using for a long time, the ear foam feels very soft. Sound is crystal clear with strong bass, way better than beats headphone in all ramification! The only thing I didn't like about bose OE2i is the slight sound leakage. other than that its the absolute best!
customer_reviews.author: Ayemi M.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Great sound in a portable size. I initially tried these on at a Best Buy and was very impressed with how well the bass thumped. THe overall audio is excellent in my opinion. I have also answered my iPhone calls while listening to music with these headphones on, and I have had no issues with people hearing me during my calls with it. The cord detaches as well, so I imagine that if I ever needed to replace the cord, I could order it separately.
customer_reviews.author: E. Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, with great and expansive sound. Bose sometimes gets the reputation of concentrating on mid-ranges, but only the very young have ears with sufficient dynamic range to appreciate greater range than Bose produces. For my aging ears, Bose is just right.
customer_reviews.author: Alan P. Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful headphones. I gave these as a gift and the individual loved them! He takes them with him everywhere he travels and when listening to his music. The base is not too heavy so if you like rap, consider a more base heavy headset.
customer_reviews.author: Ddale

customer_reviews.title: Warm sound
customer_reviews.text: This model isn't the current one therefore it's quite less expensive. Good sound, on the warm side yet detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have been absolutely pleased. I had planned to allocate $300-400 for headphones originally. Instead I got these for $150 and for my needs and taste they sound great, are portable, comfortable, light, and have deceptively surprising bass response. I am pleased with my purchase. Refer to my other OE2i review for more details.
customer_reviews.author: dj sj

customer_reviews.title: Great for iPhone users only
customer_reviews.text: I love bose headphones, very comfortable, great sound. I returned this because although it says the remote is for iPhone/iPod, it also says it has a mic. The mic also only works on iPhones. Other than that, great product. If you have a droid, stick with the OE2
customer_reviews.author: Missst48

customer_reviews.title: The sound is very nice. I can listen to a large variety of ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very nice. I can listen to a large variety of music genres. Bass, medium and highs work very well. Only thing I dislike is that you cannot use these earphones during long periods of time. Being OE the pression on the ears make you feel some pain.
customer_reviews.author: Muammar El Khatib

customer_reviews.title: Great, noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Just used them again on a flight, and loaned them to my spouse who could not hear his movie with his airline issued ear buds, and he heard everything once he used these. Great at noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: great set of headphones for your iphone/ipod
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound for music, very comfortable and the iphone controls are great. They don't do audio books well at all (especially if the book has sound effects).
customer_reviews.author: Bobkat

customer_reviews.title: Best Earphones I Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: Come in a neat case. You can answer the phone and talk to Siri. Oh, did I mention they sound really great? Good bottom, not squishy or formless. Good top. Great detail and image.
customer_reviews.author: Otis Hardy Maclay

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love these small and convenient headphones.. Easy to put on, easy to store in it's own little pouch. Now i hear my music and don't disturb anyone around me. How nice is that!! Quality at a good price---fantastic!!!
customer_reviews.author: Misinglenk

customer_reviews.title: Got these for travel
customer_reviews.text: Had these for few months now and they work great for a small set of headphones. Good highs and lows mostly use them with my iphone and ipad. They fold up nice and flat and have there own case for travel. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: Cord too Long
customer_reviews.text: I found the connecting cord to be too long. It gets caught on gym equipment and ruins it. The replacement cord that works with the iPhone is too expensive. I switched to Beats Wireless and am now very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Capler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible for a $100 Bose Headphones
customer_reviews.text: 6 months after buying them with moderate in house use (1 hour a day in my bed before going to sleep), I get static if I touch the cable... Terrible for a $100 Bose Headphones... Im always careful with placing them in their case after use.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo Jose Chan

customer_reviews.title: I FINALLY fit in with First Class.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a Gold Box Deal. Great Bose quality. Light and comfortable to wear. Easy to stow. Down side is no blue tooth but still a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: After looking at these headphones at retail stores, I found the price on Amazon about $50-60 less. Great base for a headset without noise cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: William B. Crouch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Headphones fit my needs listening to music at my computer. Music clarity is great, headphones are comfortable to wear, and I thought the price was very fair considering the quality.
customer_reviews.author: llaw

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have decided to put the extra bucks to get this one because the logitech 4000 didn't work for me for one reason only, too much pressure on my ears. But the bose feels just right, not a problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tul

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmad present!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my wife for Christmas. Blocks out all my sports while she listens to music or audio books. It is well made and fits her iphone or cd player
customer_reviews.author: gjmank

customer_reviews.title: Best you can buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: You will appreciate music like never before with the OE2i. You will hear lyrics so clearly, you will finally understand what your favorite artist has been saying for years. Definitely get the controls on the cord if you have an apple product. That way you never have to touch your apple device, just enjoy the music.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Lover Extrodinaire

customer_reviews.title: Ultra clear, amazing bass
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are awesome! They are very clear so I am able to hear every voice when listing to pentatonix. But the bass is so heavy that the headphones rattle while I'm listing to dubstep! Their amazing
customer_reviews.author: Chase Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Bose Head Phones....
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted not real bulky they break down very easy and sound quality is great they reduce background sound but a good 85% which is good enough for me but for the price I could t beat it even the Bluetooth sounds good I wouldn't definenitly reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Ray Salinas

customer_reviews.title: nice sound, bass is better when you adjust your
customer_reviews.text: Very lite, nice sound, bass is better when you adjust your system
customer_reviews.author: Watcher

customer_reviews.title: Great for music. Still working on my movie sounds.
customer_reviews.text: They are a quality product. Plays my streaming music at peak sound. Sound quality with my movies is just ok.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually great fan of Bose products, love this headphone and this is my second one. recommended for music more than for phone conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: Bose OE2i headphones
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly and with excellent quality sound. Comfortable to wear. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: Arfito

customer_reviews.title: Bose
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. I will use it with my Ipad as I travel across the states on my vacation
customer_reviews.author: Clint Gardunia

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone
customer_reviews.text: It's great headphones. Lite and slim! I would recommend it to any one who Is a Bose fan, iPhone audio is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Bose is quiality
customer_reviews.text: no other can compare to this, if you are looking for true sound quality instead of just a bass-full sound this is you item.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Millan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Headset for music and also phone
customer_reviews.text: This is an advanced headset which is very compact yet most powerful. I love using this for music, calls, movies, etc. The track control option is great you dont have to take your media player everytime you need to change the song. Very good and I would definitely recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Bhagya

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound and very practical to carry on my laptop bag. Very comfortable to use for long periods of time
customer_reviews.author: I. Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Bose OE2i headphone
customer_reviews.text: I carry with me all the time. Much better then earlier on the ear. Pros- Light weight, nice sound and good design. Cons- Over priced compared to other brands
customer_reviews.author: navnit

customer_reviews.title: These are great. The have awesome sound plus they are so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great. The have awesome sound plus they are so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Francy

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Tried various headsets and this suited our needs the best. Time will tell if it maintains these expectations. Has been working well so far.
customer_reviews.author: giff42

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and a very light weight feel. I use them all of the time and would recommend them. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Melva G. Greene

customer_reviews.title: This is a great deal
customer_reviews.text: I was going to buy the Beats but the price was just to high but i am into electronics so keep me posted!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Smith Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a present for my husband. He loves them. The sound is fabulous, and he loves how lightweight they are.
customer_reviews.author: angie harden

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that they are.Great in all aspects , I could not ask for anything better, thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mick Whelpley

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headphones to listening to music on my travels,i realized that it has a comfortable ear pads and i can control my iPhone from remote. I has very good Quality too .
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Please yourself and try these headphones. Bose hit the audio nail on the head with these phones. I put on Tori Amos live version of Winter and was sitting front row and center. Patti Smith's Gimmie Shelter from the album Twelve sealed the deal. The word to describe the sound reproduction is faithful. Comfort level and wearer adjustment is wonderful. Amazon customer service and delivery were, as usual, fantastic. You'll miss the mark by not trying these phones !! You could spend a hell of a lot more but not get this level of sound quality. Try them !!
customer_reviews.author: Caddisman

customer_reviews.title: True love
customer_reviews.text: My dog ripped my first pair to shreds, I bought a nother without that much thought, they are truely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: So glad i finally got it! It came in like a day and The price was amazing! These headphones are a must buy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Fall in love with it!
customer_reviews.text: I first heard the headphone in apple store and fall in love with it at once. I think it is even better than studio monster! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up for this Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. Better then I expected. You can always count on Bose to deliver superior audio products.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Bose OE2i Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a great set of headphones and after deciding I looked for the best price around, and that's when I found it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: very good sound quality, a little bit warm ears
customer_reviews.text: everything s perfect, but my ears heat up a little bit after a while.... very good sound quality and nice small.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Schiele

customer_reviews.title: The acoustic is marvelous and I can use in intercontinental flights without feeling a bit of a bother.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to transport, due to the weight and size. i use every day and I am feeling the music. i recommend the purchase of these wonderful headphones.
customer_reviews.author: marcelino

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable and the sound is clear, its the very best head phone i have ever had. i like it
customer_reviews.author: Liu Jie

customer_reviews.title: SUPER COMFORTABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I was debating a first whether to buy the Bose or Beats.. But with comfort, I think I made the right decision. But if you want more bass, go for Beats. But I am very satisfied with the product I purchased because it is super handy and it already even came with a case. Really good for traveling! Also, the control works perfectly in my Macbook, iPhone and iPod. Makes it really easy for me to switch songs when I'm walking and the iPod is in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: edothecat

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is the item that i want It ships very fast. It matches my expectation. I would recommended this item to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Yan Wang

customer_reviews.title: awesome headset!
customer_reviews.text: great sound! your in a world of your own listening to music.. for skype calls it's kind of problematic since you cannot hear yourself talking.
customer_reviews.author: Tomer Benyamini

customer_reviews.title: very good. I like it.
customer_reviews.text: very good. i like it very much. The service is very good. The best of the bunch sounds fantastic but is a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.author: JiangDing

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality and fit. Only complaint is that they can make you ears a little warm over time. Suspect that's just the nature of the beast.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: not cheap but great quality
customer_reviews.text: This headphones perform great and feel so comfortable you almost forget you are using them. They are not cheap, but at least you know you spend your money right, and besides, they are great for traveling
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my husband who was reluctant to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband who was reluctant to get one for himself and now he can't do without it. Inexpensive compare to others but do the same job
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Best choice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these headphones on the advice of a co-worker who had the same issue with the ear padding on old ones. Bose is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my walks - but be careful, they really cancel out noise. My husband wants a pair!
customer_reviews.author: jqmi73

customer_reviews.title: Not upto Bose Standards
customer_reviews.text: Not so great. OK kind of product. Kind of not expected from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Vara Malladi

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: First purchase Bose headphones bass good feeling a lot stronger than I had hoped would later use headphones other Bose headphones
customer_reviews.author: shuai wang

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried quite a few headphones on the market before settling on these. The sound quality is fantastic. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Cathal O' Riordan

customer_reviews.title: This one is a perfect Headphones I really recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very comfortable, but the on-ear design doesn't block out all external noise. The Good The Bose OE2i Headphones are more compact than the original OE ("on-ear") headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Thiago

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: The design is not as good as the quality of the headphones. Sometimes the headphones do not work but you have to move the cord a bit. Very cheap and worth it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product to enjoy music in the airplane and in the office. Pros: It's Bose Cons: Cord too long
customer_reviews.author: Luis Armando Lopez Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It hurts my ears. I can not use it long time.
customer_reviews.author: T.N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphone
customer_reviews.text: After looking at several different headphones I decided to get the bose headphones and couldn't be happier with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: bob slim

customer_reviews.title: Not Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my first Bose headphones, and I can honestly say that it's not worth the money. I have a $40.00 pair of ear buds that are just as good. I feel that your just paying for the name.
customer_reviews.author: John K Fox

customer_reviews.title: ANDROID
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE, THE MOUTH PEICE DOES NOT WORK FOR ANDROID PHONES, IT WAS VERY DISAPPOINTING TO SPEND $100 ON HEADPHONES WITH MOUTHPEICE AND IT DIDNT WORK
customer_reviews.author: MOOSY F.

customer_reviews.title: I have tested B&W headphones that sound much better for a similar
customer_reviews.text: They are ok. I have tested B&W headphones that sound much better for a similar price
customer_reviews.author: gpsarros

customer_reviews.title: While these headphones work very well with Apple products-finding an ...
customer_reviews.text: While these headphones work very well with Apple products-finding an extension cable to plug into home theatre sound system was impossible. Once Again Apple products are Only compatible with other Apple products. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tannen

customer_reviews.title: Not sure how much bose is paying people to give these a good review...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not writing a long drawn out review of these but simply put these headphones are garbage. Sure if you are upgrading from your stock apple headphones they will sound great, but if you are uprading from a halfway decent pair, then theres nothing these headphones have to offer that would justify the cost or upgrade. I've had a pair of ultimate ears and a pair of vmodas' and I splurged on getting this pair and was immediatly dissapointed. I gave it a few weeks and just got more angry day by day that bose has the nerve to try to pass these as a good pair of headphones. Two words of advice for anyone looking to upgrade.....look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P

customer_reviews.title: Geat headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are stellar sounding+fitting headphones.They are very adjustable,fold up nicely to travel with+the sound is really clear with typical Bose quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jokergeorge

product_meta.title: Bose OE2i Audio Headphones - Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
FROM THE MANUFACTURER


BOSE® OE2I AUDIO HEADPHONES - BLACK 
 * Advanced acoustic design brings out the depth and clarity of your music
 * Inline remote for control of iPhone®/iPod®
 * Inline microphone for hands-free calling 
 * Lighter, updated design features slim headband and memory foam ear cushions that reduce pressure points for hours of comfortable listening
 * Fold-flat, collapsible design allows easy storage in carrying case 

Bose OE2i headphones combine lifelike audio with lightweight comfort. They deliver the Bose sound you expect, but they are even smaller and lighter than our original on-ear headphones. You'll hear the full range of your favorite music, from deep lows to clear highs. The sleeker, slimmer design looks great too. And OE2i headphones feature an inline microphone for iPhone calling and an inline remote that controls your Apple® product.

BIG PERFORMANCE, SMALL SIZE
OE2i headphones are lightweight and comfortable for hours of on-the-go calls and music listening. OE2i headphones feature an enhanced TriPort® acoustic headphone structure, so you can experience big audio performance from these small earcups. TriPort technology delivers even the deep, low notes with clarity, letting you enjoy the full range of your music, movies or games.

The compact design offers a smaller, lighter and slimmer profile than our original on-ear headphones. Memory foam ear cushions conform to the shape of your ears, and the contoured headband sits evenly, without pressure points, on your head. They're so comfortable, you may forget you have them on - until someone tells you how sleek they look.

The detachable cable connects directly to one earcup, so there's less tangling than conventional Y-cables. And the headphones fold flat for storage in the protective carrying case.

IN TUNE AND IN TOUCH
OE2i headphones are designed specifically for use with select Apple products. You can take calls on your iPhone and switch between calls and music with one-touch ease. The integrated inline remote, located on the back of the microphone, lets you control your iPod, iPhone and other Apple devices. Adjust volume, play/pause tracks, skip tracks forward/backward, fast forward/rewind and change playlists - all while enjoying your music with Bose sound.

OE2i headphones, designed for use with select Apple® devices, let you switch between calls and music with one-touch ease. KEY FEATURES
 * TriPort technology, available only from Bose, reproduces tonally balanced audio with deep low notes from lightweight, on-ear headphones.
 * Bose acoustic equalization fine-tunes the frequency response of the headphones for exceptional audio performance.
 * Inline three-button remote controls volume, track selection and voice applications on select Apple products, and switches between calls and music.
 * Inline microphone allows for hands-free iPhone calling and access to certain voice applications, such as VoiceOver and VoiceControl.
 * Soft, cushioned earcups rest gently on your ears, providing a smooth, natural audio experience and a comfortable fit.
 * Fold flat earcups rotate into headband for increased portability and easy storage.
 *  The headphones fold flat for storage in the zippered carrying case to protect them during travel. 
 * Adjustable headband allows approximately three inches of adjustment in length. Sturdy design features soft cushion for added comfort.
 * Detachable cable on a single earcup means less tangling and more convenient storage.
 * Slim carrying case stores and protects headphones and accessories during travel.
 * Hologram label provides a visual identifier and unique product code signifying the headphones are a genuine article from Bose. The hologram also has various security features that enable Bose to confirm the authenticity of the label.

ABOUT BOSE
Dedication to research and excellence: It's been the Bose approach to better sound since Dr. Amar G. Bose founded the company in 1964. Ever since then, Bose engineers have focused on creating better technology. You'll find that focus exemplified in Bose OE2 audio headphones, with advances that ensure premium performance and convenience.
